title: nf-genome-assembler pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

name.errorMessage: Assembly name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

platform.description: The platform used for sequencing: nanopore / pacbio
platform.errorMessage: platform must be provided and must be 'nanopore' or 'pacbio'

genome_size.errorMessage: Genome size must be provided and must contain digits only

reads.description: Path to raw long reads (compressed) for draft assembly. File must be a compressed Fastq (preferred) / Fasta file.
reads.errorMessage: File must be a compressed Fastq (preferred) / Fasta file. File name cannot contain spaces.

hic_fastq_1.description: Path to Fastq file (compressed) for Hi-C reads (R1).
hic_fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for Hi-C reads cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

hic_fastq_2.description: Path to Fastq file (compressed) for Hi-C reads (R2).
hic_fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for Hi-C reads cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

assembly.help_text: You can provide an assembly combine specific steps to start at a desired step in the pipeline.
